title: Trump announces next phase of Gaza peace plan
shortDescription: The Board of Peace will be comprised of world leaders and have a small executive board comprised of Trump’s advisers Jared Kushner and Steve Witkoff.

title: Trump to sign bill allowing schools to offer whole and 2% milk
shortDescription: President Trump will sign legislation Wednesday reversing Obama-era standards to allow schools to offer whole milk and 2% milk.

title: Is Trump's interest in Greenland a threat to NATO?
shortDescription: Why is President Donald Trump's interest in Greenland a potential threat to NATO?

title: Trump says US 'needs' Greenland ahead of Vance's meeting with Denmark
shortDescription: 'The United States needs Greenland for the purpose of National Security,' Trump said in a social media post.

title: Trump says Greenland vital to Golden Dome
shortDescription: Danish and Greenlandic foreign ministers will meet with Vice President JD Vance at the White House.

title: Viral video has sparked a new controversy surrounding U.S. President Donald Trump
shortDescription: A viral video has sparked a new controversy surrounding U.S. President Donald Trump after he was recorded flipping the Middle finger at a heckler during a visit to a Ford auto plant in Michigan.

title: ICE detention centers are booming under Trump. Here’s how.
shortDescription: ICE detention has expanded rapidly under Trump, both in terms of the number of facilities and people held.

title: Trump claims morality limits his power
shortDescription: In an interview with "CBS Evening News," President Donald Trump said his morality is what limits his power domestically.

title: Trump says his power in the US is 'limited by my morality'
shortDescription: President Trump discussed his "morality," Iran and the DOJ's investigation of Jerome Powell in an interview with CBS Evening News.

title: Trump flips off 'lunatic' heckler at Ford plant in Detroit
shortDescription: A cellphone video shows Trump flipping off a heckler at a Ford facility in what the White House says was 'an appropriate' response

title: When will Trump Mobile deliver T1 cellphone? See the new date.
shortDescription: The wireless phone company bearing the president's name pushed back the delivery date for its T1 phone. It has done so multiple times.

title: Trump highlights manufacturing during visit to Ford factory
shortDescription: President Trump visited the factory floor of a Ford plant in Dearborn on Jan. 13, where he defended his sweeping tariffs.

title: Trump to halt funds for sanctuary cities
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced a plan to stop payments to sanctuary cities and states starting February 1.

title: Donald Trump's estranged niece, Mary, reveals she's newly married
shortDescription: Mary Trump in a Substack post said she got married in a private ceremony last October.

title: Trump says he will 'act accordingly' on Iran
shortDescription: President Trump says he will "act accordingly" on Iran after receiving accurate death toll numbers.

title: Trump says he's withholding funds from sanctuary cities and states
shortDescription: President Trump said his administration starting Feb. 1 will withhold federal funds from sanctuary cities and states that have sanctuary cities.
